channel.title: Star of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the star of the day.

item.title: Supernova impostor
item.description: Supernova impostors are stellar explosions that appear at first to be a supernova but do not destroy their progenitor stars. As such, they are a class of extra-powerful novae. They are also known as Type V supernovae, Eta Carinae analogs, and giant eruptions of luminous blue variables (LBV).
